title: agentF
author: agentF
content: Hey all!This is my name project: PNNV.com. You can read the official announcement here: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5410871.msg60837725#msg60837725I'm looking for individuals who can post threads about PNNV.com in different crypto forums such as Reddit/BTC Reddit/bitcoin.The headline should be (not exact, but you will get the point) Preev is down, he is an allternative PNNVÂ Preev is down; an excellent alternative is called PNNV.This means Preev and PNNV should be in the subject.I'm not looking for spammers. It should be at least 2-3 posts in a single forum. Before you post, you should reply to this thread and wait for my approval.I'm paying 25$ USDT for a post.

comments.author: sujonali1819
comments.body: Hi, I can help you to post it in different forums. Telegram @sujonali1819btw nice move I am also finding an alternative after preev down. After checking the site I want to suggest USD amount should be counted as only a few units. This looks not good to me

comments.author: agentF
comments.body: Quote from: sujonali1819 on August 28, 2022, 06:46:45 AMHi, I can help you to post it in different forums. Telegram @sujonali1819btw nice move I am also finding an alternative after preev down. After checking the site I want to suggest USD amount should be counted as only a few units. This looks not good to me Hey!This bug will be fixed shortly.You can DM me here, im not using TG.

comments.author: Oduada
comments.body: Hi there! I can post in both Reddit community and ever available for a DM. My telegram is @tymaxim

comments.author: Woodie
comments.body: @agentF ,Sign me up for this task!And could you clarify the $25 pay as being per post even on Reddit , which means 3 threads will get you $75.

comments.author: hugeblack
comments.body: I like your activity and I hope that you will continue to develop the site or at least that there will be more than one member who can access the domain (in case you do not have time to renew the DNS)In general, advertising here is better than wasting money on an article that will quickly disappear over time, and since the signature campaign is expensive, I suggest you rent Personal Texts for, say, 3-5 dollars a week.Anyway, As long as you don't show ads, I will (for some time) advertise to you for free

comments.author: agentF
comments.body: Quote from: hugeblack on August 28, 2022, 05:36:48 PMI like your activity and I hope that you will continue to develop the site or at least that there will be more than one member who can access the domain (in case you do not have time to renew the DNS)In general, advertising here is better than wasting money on an article that will quickly disappear over time, and since the signature campaign is expensive, I suggest you rent Personal Texts for, say, 3-5 dollars a week.Anyway, As long as you don't show ads, I will (for some time) advertise to you for freeThank you buddy!There wont. be any ads.Community self funded project, i already paid the DNS for 10 years and about to extend the domain as well.

comments.author: shasan
comments.body: It is a great initiative that you have created such a website. It will help us a lot as we are facing issue on preev from a long time. But I want to suggest like hugeblack to advertise on the forum by using personal text or avatar. And in this way you will get more traffic than posting on the reddit or somewhere else. Also, you may create a good design announcement thread on this forum which will be helpful too.

comments.author: agentF
comments.body: Quote from: shasan on August 29, 2022, 04:17:01 PMIt is a great initiative that you have created such a website. It will help us a lot as we are facing issue on preev from a long time. But I want to suggest like hugeblack to advertise on the forum by using personal text or avatar. And in this way you will get more traffic than posting on the reddit or somewhere else. Also, you may create a good design announcement thread on this forum which will be helpful too.Thank you for taking the time and posting on my thread.I appreciate it; as for the announcement thread, it has already been created: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5410871.20;topicseenYou are correct, and I rather make an avatar campaign
